p: Statgraphics Centurion XVI (Statistical Graphics, Rockville, MD, USA) was used to generate and analyse the BBD results. The graphic analysis of the main effects and interactions between variables was used, and the analysis of variance (ANOVA) was carried out. SPSS 15.0 (Chicago, IL, USA) was used to perform the statistical analysis of experimental data by one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA). Differences between average values were assessed based on the Tukey test at a confidence level of 95% ( p < 0.05).
